S.FORM: == Ye-han.Kan-nay-di 約翰·甘迺迪 == Ye-han.Fay-ce-cea-la-e-de.Kan-nay-di, caysiw caypic mihcaan lima a bulad tusiw a dimiad katukuh caysiw nemlu mihcaan caycay bulad tutu demiad, u ngangan nida ci Ye-han.F.Kan-nay-di "John F. Kennedy" ,JFK atu Cie-ke'.Kan-nay-di "Jack Kennedy", belihen nu cudad ci Kan-nay-di, saka lulim nu Amilika a Cuntun, u Amilika samilaliday nu lalabu nu lumaan a tademaw cini Kan-nay-di a tademawan, saka lihalay nu Amilika a dayhiw, ci nida u Amilika i likisian katukuh ayda sakasepat ni patayan nutaw a Cuntun. F·甘迺迪(John F. Kennedy),JFK或傑克·甘迺迪(Jack Kennedy), . sakatusa nu kalepacawan, mala Amilika nu sakakaay nu hitay ci nida, naytida i Nan-tay-ping-yang miala tu ma'lulay nu pabalungaay a hitay nu Amilika, sisa idaw ku kawlah nida tu Ce-sin payaan, sa mikawaw tu cence'. Caysiw sipnem mihcaan katukuh caysiw nemsep mihcaan mala Amilika nu Cun-yi-yen atu Cen-yi-yen masakaputay. caysiw nemsep mihcaan mala Cuntun, mala sayaway nu singkuan tu tinsukiw a Cuntun. sakakawawan nida pasu, len-pan-cun-pea-cun sakasumad nu kalecadan a saka caycaycaycaysep bangguan sincen patuduan, Culuowan kawawan, Kupafeidan kabalihenawan, Puolin langan a nipatideng, Taykun sakasetset, Yina kalepacawan atu caay kaw Amilika tademaw nipilaylayan. . kaadihan i labuay nu lumaan 家族的發跡 baki ni Ye-han.Kan-nay-di ci Pay-cua-ke'. Kan-nay-di u Ay-e-lan-wi-ke'-se-hu-de niyaduay nu tademaw, caywal sipwal mihingan milaliw, mabulaw katuku i Amilika Ma-sa-cu-say-cuo a Puo-se-tun. baki ci Pay-cua-ke'.J.Kan-nay-di itida i Pu-se-tun misiwbay tu kakalipahan, misiwbay tu ngiku, milabu tu tidaay a cence nu kawawan, namala Ma-sa-cu-say-cuo a giingngan. J . wama ci Law-ye-se'. P.Kan-nay-di i caywal walwal mihcaan lecuhan i Pu-se-tun, caysiw caytu mihcaan i Ha-fuo ta'sye mihedek micudad, nu gingku ku kawaw nida. caysiw caysip mihcaan itida i Pu-se-tun Ke-lun-pi-ya gingku mala cuncinli. sakacacay nikalepacawan tu kitakidan itida i Pu-min-han misangaay tu balunga a kusian mala fucuncili. hedek sa malepacaw u babalai nida ci Kan-nay-di misalama tu kupiaw yadah ku'tan, mala siidaay nu tademaw, nikudan tayda i Haw-lay-wu misiwbay tu kakacuduan. caysiw lusep mihcaan taluma' i Pu-se-tun. caysiw lutu mihcaan misinkiw tu cuntun nu Amilika tawya, patideng ci nida ci Hu-lan-ke'-lin.De-la-nuo. Luo-se-fu. caysiw sipsep mihcaan caycay a bulad, babalaki a Kan-nay-di yadah ku cinglaw ci nidaan ales han tu nida ku tase a kawawan. 父親老約瑟·P . yu mahida nika udip早年生活 caysiw caypic mihcaan lima a bulad tusiw dimiad, lecuhan ci Kan-nay-di, babalaki nida i caysiw caysip mihcaan cacay a bataan nu demiad mikikung, sasiwa ku wawa nu heni, sasepat ku tatami lalima ku tatayna, saka tusa ci Ye-han.Kan-nay-di. 1917年5月29日, . ci Ye-han.Kan-nay-di limaay ku mihcaan nida micumud tu Fuo-luo-li-ta-lu-fen-lai-de cacudadn minanam, tuluay a mihcaan, itida ci nida minanam tu mulaay a cacudadan katukuh tu nu wawaan a nipinanam tu tuluay a cudadan. pituay ku mihcaan ni Kan-nay-di atu siwaay a kakaan ci Siw-ye-se.P. Kan-nay-di patayda i cacudadan minanam. caysiw lulim mihcaan nu sadingsing, miyukiw ci nida micumud minanam i Pu-lin-se-tun tasye a cudadan, nika kaiyan nu cacudadan. nikudan, saicelang sa ci ama nida, tu sabaw cacay a buladan micumud minanam. tada imelan tu ci nida, katukuh sa ci nida tu sabaw tusa a bulad minanam. caysiw lunem mihcaan pitu a bulad, micumud ci Kan-nay-di tu Ha-fuo tasye minanam sa maala. P . caysiw sipsep mihcaan siwa a bulad, ci Ye-han. Kan-nay-di tayda i Se-dan-fuo tasye sangsyeyun minanam. sakay i Cia-li-hu-ni-ya-cuo mikapah tu udip. nipinanam nida tu kakinkiwan a cudadan tatenga u sangwu atu Kuoci-cinzun, nika manamuh ci nida tu cencesye atu kuocikunsi. sakakapah tu udip mutikuaca tu caysiw sipcay mihcaan taluma' tu Amilika nu walian, kainai'an nu lawad mikilim tu mamisulit tu dadatengan nu wama . ci Ye-han. Kan-nay-di namisimsim tu sapisingsi tu sapicumud i Ye-lu tasye fasyeyen minanam, nika sadikuday pacabay ci nida tu lumaay a tademaw tayda i Na-mei-cuo midang ales hantu nida, taydan nu heni i A-ken-ting, Pa-si, Ce'-li' taydan i U-la-kuy, Mi-lu, E'-kua-duo, Ke-lun-pi-ya atu Pa-na-ma apuyu ku nipahanhan nuheni i tida. 1940年9月, .

== Ye-han.Kan-nay-di 約翰·甘迺迪 == Ye-han.Fay-ce-cea-la-e-de.Kan-nay-di, caysiw caypic mihcaan lima a bolad tosiw a dimiad katokoh caysiw nemlo mihcaan caycay bolad toto demiad, o ngangan nida ci Ye-han.F.Kan-nay-di "John F. Kennedy" ,JFK ato Cie-ke'.Kan-nay-di "Jack Kennedy", belihen no codad ci Kan-nay-di, saka lolim no Amilika a Conton, o Amilika samilaliday no lalabo no lomaan a tademaw cini Kan-nay-di a tademawan, saka lihalay no Amilika a dayhiw, ci nida o Amilika i likisian katokoh ayda sakasepat ni patayan notaw a Conton. F·甘迺迪(John F. Kennedy),JFK或傑克·甘迺迪(Jack Kennedy), . sakatosa no kalepacawan, mala Amilika no sakakaay no hitay ci nida, naytida i Nan-tay-ping-yang miala to ma'lolay no pabalongaay a hitay no Amilika, sisa idaw ko kawlah nida to Ce-sin payaan, sa mikawaw to cence'. Caysiw sipnem mihcaan katokoh caysiw nemsep mihcaan mala Amilika no Con-yi-yen ato Cen-yi-yen masakapotay. caysiw nemsep mihcaan mala Conton, mala sayaway no singkoan to tinsokiw a Conton. sakakawawan nida paso, len-pan-con-pea-con sakasomad no kalecadan a saka caycaycaycaysep banggoan sincen patodoan, Coloowan kawawan, Kopafeidan kabalihenawan, Poolin langan a nipatideng, Taykon sakasetset, Yina kalepacawan ato caay kaw Amilika tademaw nipilaylayan. . kaadihan i laboay no lomaan 家族的發跡 baki ni Ye-han.Kan-nay-di ci Pay-coa-ke'. Kan-nay-di o Ay-e-lan-wi-ke'-se-ho-de niyadoay no tademaw, caywal sipwal mihingan milaliw, mabolaw katoko i Amilika Ma-sa-co-say-coo a Poo-se-ton. baki ci Pay-coa-ke'.J.Kan-nay-di itida i Po-se-ton misiwbay to kakalipahan, misiwbay to ngiko, milabo to tidaay a cence no kawawan, namala Ma-sa-co-say-coo a giingngan. J . wama ci Law-ye-se'. P.Kan-nay-di i caywal walwal mihcaan lecohan i Po-se-ton, caysiw cayto mihcaan i Ha-foo ta'sye mihedek micodad, no gingko ko kawaw nida. caysiw caysip mihcaan itida i Po-se-ton Ke-lon-pi-ya gingko mala concinli. sakacacay nikalepacawan to kitakidan itida i Po-min-han misangaay to balonga a kosian mala foconcili. hedek sa malepacaw o babalai nida ci Kan-nay-di misalama to kopiaw yadah ko'tan, mala siidaay no tademaw, nikodan tayda i Haw-lay-wo misiwbay to kakacodoan. caysiw losep mihcaan taloma' i Po-se-ton. caysiw loto mihcaan misinkiw to conton no Amilika tawya, patideng ci nida ci Ho-lan-ke'-lin.De-la-noo. Loo-se-fo. caysiw sipsep mihcaan caycay a bolad, babalaki a Kan-nay-di yadah ko cinglaw ci nidaan ales han to nida ko tase a kawawan. 父親老約瑟·P . yo mahida nika odip早年生活 caysiw caypic mihcaan lima a bolad tosiw dimiad, lecohan ci Kan-nay-di, babalaki nida i caysiw caysip mihcaan cacay a bataan no demiad mikikong, sasiwa ko wawa no heni, sasepat ko tatami lalima ko tatayna, saka tosa ci Ye-han.Kan-nay-di. 1917年5月29日, . ci Ye-han.Kan-nay-di limaay ko mihcaan nida micomod to Foo-loo-li-ta-lo-fen-lai-de cacodadn minanam, toloay a mihcaan, itida ci nida minanam to molaay a cacodadan katokoh to no wawaan a nipinanam to toloay a codadan. pitoay ko mihcaan ni Kan-nay-di ato siwaay a kakaan ci Siw-ye-se.P. Kan-nay-di patayda i cacodadan minanam. caysiw lolim mihcaan no sadingsing, miyokiw ci nida micomod minanam i Po-lin-se-ton tasye a codadan, nika kaiyan no cacodadan. nikodan, saicelang sa ci ama nida, to sabaw cacay a boladan micomod minanam. tada imelan to ci nida, katokoh sa ci nida to sabaw tosa a bolad minanam. caysiw lonem mihcaan pito a bolad, micomod ci Kan-nay-di to Ha-foo tasye minanam sa maala. P . caysiw sipsep mihcaan siwa a bolad, ci Ye-han. Kan-nay-di tayda i Se-dan-foo tasye sangsyeyon minanam. sakay i Cia-li-ho-ni-ya-coo mikapah to odip. nipinanam nida to kakinkiwan a codadan tatenga o sangwo ato Kooci-cinzon, nika manamoh ci nida to cencesye ato koocikonsi. sakakapah to odip motikoaca to caysiw sipcay mihcaan taloma' to Amilika no walian, kainai'an no lawad mikilim to mamisolit to dadatengan no wama . ci Ye-han. Kan-nay-di namisimsim to sapisingsi to sapicomod i Ye-lo tasye fasyeyen minanam, nika sadikoday pacabay ci nida to lomaay a tademaw tayda i Na-mei-coo midang ales hanto nida, taydan no heni i A-ken-ting, Pa-si, Ce'-li' taydan i U-la-koy, Mi-lo, E'-koa-doo, Ke-lon-pi-ya ato Pa-na-ma apoyo ko nipahanhan noheni i tida. 1940年9月, .
